summary: Website for laser cutting artworks business specializing in gifts, home décor, and industrial applications in Pune market
architectural_notes: Website for laser cutting artwork business targeting Pune market
Three main product categories: gifts, home décor, industrial applications
Focus on showcasing precision, quality, and custom design capabilities
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner showing intricate laser-cut artwork with dramatic lighting and detailed patterns (hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png)
- Customized gift examples including personalized wooden plaques and decorative frames (gift-showcase.dim_800x600.png)
- Elegant home décor pieces featuring geometric wall art and ornamental designs (decor-showcase.dim_800x600.png)
- Industrial precision components showing mechanical parts and technical applications (industrial-showcase.dim_800x600.png)
- Laser cutting process visualization showing technology and precision at work (laser-process.dim_1200x800.png)
- Company workshop setting with laser cutting equipment (workshop-photo.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with hero section showcasing laser cutting artworks, highlighting creativity, precision, and unique solutions for gifting, home décor, and industrial applications
Build a product gallery showcasing three main categories: customized gifts, elegant decorative pieces, and accurate industrial components
Create an About section highlighting innovative ideas, advanced laser technology, focus on originality, durability, and flawless finishing, with emphasis on serving the Pune market
Implement a contact form for inquiries about custom orders, quotes, and general questions
Create services overview section detailing offerings for gifting solutions, home décor products, and industrial applications

Design a creative, modern visual theme with warm, sophisticated colors that convey craftsmanship and precision, using clean typography and spacious layouts that highlight the artistry of laser-cut products
Render generated product showcase images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory

new_feature_requests.summary: Website homepage showcasing laser cutting artwork services
Product gallery for customized gifts and decorative pieces
About/company section highlighting innovation and laser technology
